text: Lauren Ridloff (n√©e Teruel; born April 6, 1978) is a deaf American actress. She is known for her role as Connie on the TV series The Walking Dead. She starred in the Broadway play Children of a Lesser God, for which she was nominated for a Tony Award. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from California Category:Actors from Chicago
